title: About Us
subtext: Tucklets is a 501 (c) (3) non-profit organization, registered in California, USA (EIN 80-0748674). Tucklets sponsors Education, Health and Nutrition programs for orphans of Overcoming Faith Schools and destitute children in Kenya.
description: There are three Overcoming Faith Schools with over 900 orphaned children. The schools are in three different locations in Western Kenya (Kakamega, Nambale & Bunyore).  The schools offer quality education, meals, health services, guiding and counselling, high ethical and moral principles and other support  programs to the children.
